references.paper_title: Sharpness-aware minimization for efficiently improving generalization
references.reason: This paper introduces Sharpness-Aware Minimization (SAM), the core method analyzed in the current paper.
This paper provides one of the few existing theoretical analyses of SAM, specifically addressing the unnormalized version (USAM), which is compared to SAM in the current work.

references.paper_title: The crucial role of normalization in sharpness-aware minimization
references.reason: This paper investigates the impact of normalization on SAM, offering insights into the practical aspects of SAM that are relevant to the current paper's analysis.

references.paper_title: Enhancing sharpness-aware optimization through variance suppression
references.reason: This work presents VaSSO, a normalized variant of SAM, whose convergence properties are analyzed within the framework of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Inexact reduced gradient methods in smooth non-convex optimization
references.reason: This paper establishes foundational convergence results for inexact gradient descent methods, providing a theoretical basis for the current work's analysis of SAM and its variants.
